Line 110: Line 110:
This would also mark the first of three collaborations with star [[Tom Hanks]].
This would also mark the first of three collaborations with star [[Tom Hanks]].
â
Later on, Spielberg and Hanks, overwhelmed with the success of the film's subject, decided to team together to produce a TV mini-series based on [[Stephen Ambrose]]'s historical novel, ''[[Band of Brothers]]''. The ten-part [[Home Box Office|HBO]] mini-series follows the trials and accomplishments of the [[101st Airborne Division]], or [[506th Parachute Infantry Regiment|Easy Company]], also starting from the landing in Normandy, to the Battle of the Bulge, to the capture of [[Adolf Hitler|Hitler]]'s Eagle's Nest in Germany itself. The series was hailed as the greatest TV event of all time, winning a slew of awards both at the [[Golden Globe Award|Golden Globes]] and the [[Emmy Award|Emmys]].
+
Later on, Spielberg and Hanks, overwhelmed with the success of the film's subject, decided to team together to produce a TV mini-series based on [[Stephen Ambrose]]'s historical novel, ''[[Band of Brothers]]''. The ten-part [[Home Box Office|HBO]] mini-series follows the trials and accomplishments of the [[101st Airborne Division]], or [[506th Parachute Infantry Regiment|Easy Company]], also starting from the landing in Normandy, to the [[Battle of the Bulge]], to the capture of [[Adolf Hitler|Hitler]]'s [[Kehlsteinhaus|Eagle's Nest]] in Germany itself. The series was hailed as the greatest TV event of all time, winning a slew of awards both at the [[Golden Globe Award|Golden Globes]] and the [[Emmy Award|Emmys]].
==2000s: Spielberg's experimental period==
==2000s: Spielberg's experimental period==
